SEARCH
Package ua.toptar.toptarfuelstationpos.controller

Class AdminController

java.lang.Object
ua.toptar.toptarfuelstationpos.controller.AdminController
@Controller @RequestMapping("/admin") public class AdminController extends Object
Controller for handling admin-related requests. Provides endpoints for viewing dashboards, transactions, analytics, and exporting transaction data.

  • Constructor Details

    • AdminController

      public AdminController(TransactionService transactionService, TransactionRepository transactionRepository, FuelTypeRepository fuelTypeRepository, com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.ObjectMapper objectMapper)
      Constructs a new AdminController with the specified dependencies.
      Parameters:
      transactionService - the service for managing transactions
      transactionRepository - the repository for accessing transaction data
      fuelTypeRepository - the repository for accessing fuel type data
      objectMapper - the mapper for converting objects to JSON

  • Method Details

    • showDashboard

      @GetMapping("/dashboard") public String showDashboard(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the admin dashboard with transaction statistics. Includes total transactions, total revenue, average transaction amount, and recent transactions.
      Parameters:
      model - the model to add attributes for the view
      Returns:
      the name of the admin dashboard view template

    • showTransactions

      @GetMapping("/transactions") public String showTransactions(@RequestParam(defaultValue="0") int page, @RequestParam(required=false) String fuelTypeName, @RequestParam(required=false) String startDate, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays a paginated list of transactions with optional filtering by fuel type and start date.
      Parameters:
      page - the page number to display, defaults to 0
      fuelTypeName - the name of the fuel type to filter by, can be null
      startDate - the start date to filter transactions, in ISO format, can be null
      model - the model to add attributes for the view
      Returns:
      the name of the transactions view template

    • showAnalytics

      @GetMapping("/analytics") public String showAnalytics(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Displays the analytics page with sales and revenue statistics. Includes sales and revenue data by fuel type and total revenue, grouped by daily, weekly, and monthly periods.
      Parameters:
      model - the model to add attributes for the view
      Returns:
      the name of the analytics view template

    • exportTransactions

      @GetMapping("/transactions/export") public void exportTransactions(@RequestParam(required=false) String fuelTypeName, @RequestParam(required=false) String startDate, jakarta.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response) throws IOException
      Exports transactions to an Excel file with optional filtering by fuel type and start date. The exported file includes transaction details such as ID, fuel type, price, volume, total amount, date, and username.
      Parameters:
      fuelTypeName - the name of the fuel type to filter by, can be null
      startDate - the start date to filter transactions, in ISO format, can be null
      response - the HTTP response to write the Excel file to
      Throws:
      IOException - if an error occurs while writing to the response output stream
